#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  std:ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  int t,n,i,tmp,mx=-1,id;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--)
  { mx=-1; 
  cin>>n;
  id=1;
  for(i=0;i<n;i++)
  {
  	cin>>tmp;
  	if(tmp>mx)
  	{
  		mx=tmp;
  		id=i+1;
  	}
  }
  cout<<id<<"\n";	
  }
  return 0;
}
